meyin upatha ha maranaya yana dekehi swabhawa pahadili kara thibe.pubbeniwasanussathi nyanaya ha chuthupapatha nyanaya magin, maranayata path wu pudgalayage pera bhawayan ha pasu bhawayan pilibanda adahasa dakwa thibe.

aprel 3:52 pawa, anuradhapura, jangama durakathana upangaru 2,000
eeta amatharawa rajapakshawarunta samagame sewakayan kupitha kirimata nidahas awasthawak labadi thibe.
me alobhaya aarya alobhayayi.
thira pitapath liwima pahasuwen igena ganna puluwan.
eka sarayak gotabhaya mahaththaya athsan kala amerikan thanapathith ekka aarakshaka giwisumak.

jiwithaya sobadahama manussakama aadarayawirahawath eka rasak thamayi.
eyata hethuwa samata ahithakara nishpadana welanda pale pawathina nisayi.
emenma, owun wisin handunwadena mema swayanpalaka motar ratha da minis jiwitha thula wiplawiya wenasak sidukarana bawa nam kiwahakiya.
eya badena wita mirikagath kamaranga walata miris, thunapaha, kaha, lunu dama athaga thelata damanna.
chithra kalawata upan hapankam dakwu chithralathata kumak siduwuye dayi nodanimi.
niwaradi kirimata sthuthiyi.
mama hanikara, kadara, adhishtanashili kenek neweyi.

patuna 1 rajasinha 2 mahanuwara wadawasamin rajyawichala rajasinhawaru rajasinha[sanskaranaya] rajasinha yannehi sarala arutha wanuye sinha rajaya yanuyi෴ mulwarata rajasinha yana namaya apa sawanatha wakenne sithawaka rajasinha nohoth palamu rajasinha rjjuruwan wahansege namaya hethuweni෴ rajasinha yana namaya pasuwa hela bhupathin kihipa denekunma wisin siya rajakiya namaya lesin bhawitha karannata yeduni෴ palamu rajasinha raju gath maga yamata sarasuna yayi sithiya haki dewani rajasinha rajunge namaya apat deweni kota hamu we෴ inpasu rajasinha yana namaya apa dakinne shri wira parakrama narendrasinha rajungen pasu sinhala kiritayata urumakam ki waduga nayakkara wanshika rajun sathara denage namayangeni෴ emathuda nowa· ada enam nuthanaye pawa atharin pathara ho rajasinha yana nama dharin apata hamu we෴--wishesha:dayakathwa 15:55, 12 sapthambar 2009 (yutisi) mahanuwara wadawasamin rajyawichala rajasinhawaru[sanskaranaya] wijaya rajasinha 1729-1747 kirthi shri rajasinha 1747-1782 rajadhi rajasinha 1782-1798 shri wikrama rajasinha 1798-1815
